messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/10/2004 3:43:09 PM Pacific Standard Time,
danielle.conger@... writes:

> I've upgraded my site, but it will take a couple of days to go into effect.
> Once my domain is available, I'll transfer all my files from the free site
> (url below) to the new site, and there shouldn't be any more problems
> accessing it--and those pesky ads will be gone, too. No point in having a website
> that I want people to see if they can't see it.



Whe you get it up and running let us know I'm sure a lot of us would like to
see all your hard work.

thanks
Heidi

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Danielle's website, was: moving soon
messages.msgSnippet: Heidi, I think, pointed out that she was having problems accessing my site. Well, I guess I ve learned why the free site is free. lol   Thanks for bringing it
messages.messageBody:
Heidi, I think, pointed out that she was having problems accessing my site. Well, I guess I've learned why the free site is free. lol Thanks for bringing it to my attention. Guess I haven't had many visits before.

I've upgraded my site, but it will take a couple of days to go into effect. Once my domain is available, I'll transfer all my files from the free site (url below) to the new site, and there shouldn't be any more problems accessing it--and those pesky ads will be gone, too. No point in having a website that I want people to see if they can't see it.

Danielle
http://www.geocities.com/danielleconger/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Danielle's website, was: moving soon
messages.msgSnippet: Danielle, I ve been browsing around your site and it s really fun and wonderful. You should brag about it a little bit.
messages.messageBody:
Danielle,

I've been browsing around your site and it's really fun and wonderful.
You should brag about it a little bit.<g>


http://www.geocities.com/danielleconger/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html

Deb L
